name: Carnival frenzy
description:
Carnival tower defence game. Made by Loo Xin Wei and Tan Jin Shan. Art by Loo Xin Yuan. 

Instructions

Use wasd or mouse to pan the camera. Click on stall lot to choose a stall. Click on stalls to upgrade or remove. 

Don't let the customers reach the end.

 Circus Theme (Entry of the Gladiators) – Strings Version by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted on https://www.chosic.com/
